issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement as_any for AggregateExpr
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11544](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11544). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement as_any for AggregateExpr so it can be downcast to a known implementation. Ballista needs this for serde.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11544?focusedCommentId=17280583) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9438
